Blog.post: M abuhay! Wekeke ^__^ Just wanna share with you this article I have read in the Philippine Collegian weeks ago. Haven’t read this yet? Maganda po ito, I suggest you read this if you have time. Ü

urlLink H ehe... wala lang... ayan, vend mode lang ako ulit sa RO ^___^ kasi gumagawa ako posts dito... pati mejo inaantok ako ngayon, actually di pa po ako natutulog mula kahapon ^__^ sige yun lang ^__^
I just think this song best describes my lovelife... =[

T here are moments in life when you miss someone so much that you just want to pick them from your dreams and hug them for real. When the door of happiness closes, another opens; but often times we look so long at the closed door that we don't see the one,which has been opened for us. Don't go for looks; they can deceive. Don't go for wealth; even that fades away. Go for someone who makes you smile, because it takes only a smile to make a dark day seem bright. Find the one that makes your heart smile. Dream what you want to dream; go where you want to go; be what you want to be, because you have only one life and one chance to do all the things you want to do. May you have enough happiness to make you sweet, enough trials to make you strong, enough sorrow to keep you human and enough hope to make you happy. The happiest of people don't necessarily have the best of everything; they just make the most of everything that comes along their way. The brightest future will always be based on a forgotten past; you can't go forward in life until you let go of your past failures and heartaches. When you were born, you were crying and everyone around you was smiling. Live your life so at the end, you're the one who is smiling and everyone around you is crying. Don't count the years-count the memories...........Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.

W ow hihi hello there ^__^ wow first entry ko to dito ^__^ ngayon ko lang kasi nalaman yung tungkol sa blogger na to, thanx a lot Emwhy ^__^ hmm wala ako masabi hihihi maybe this will serve as my journal for now ^__^ 12:12 in the morning, may class ako mamaya whaaaaaaaa hehe but still naglalaro pa rin ako Ragnarok, vend mode po ako, using my blacksmith named tinitintin (Loki po ako, hihi buy kayo sa vend ko ^^;) wala kasing magawa or enjoy lang ako sa pagpost dahil bago lang ako dito... ^__^ as you can see ang simple ng page ko ^__^ yun lang po... sige... magandang umaga ^__^
